question.question: 1. What is the primary goal of cluster analysis?

answers.A: - A. To classify data based on predefined labels
answers.B: - B. To find groups of objects that are similar to each other

questions.clo: Understand the basic concepts and techniques of data mining.

question.question: 2. Which of the following is NOT an application of clustering?

questions.clo: Understand the basic concepts and techniques of data mining.

question.question: 3. Which method is described as a set of nested clusters organized as a hierarchical tree?

questions.clo: Understand the basic concepts and techniques of data mining.

question.question: 4. What is the main difference between K-means and K-medoids algorithms?

answers.A: - A. K-means uses centroids while K-medoids uses medoids
answers.B: - B. K-means is hierarchical while K-medoids is partitioning
answers.C: - C. K-means is density-based while K-medoids is grid-based
answers.D: - D. K-means handles outliers better than K-medoids

questions.clo: Understand the basic concepts and techniques of data mining.

question.question: 5. Which of the following is a requirement for cluster analysis?

answers.A: - A. Ability to deal with noisy data

questions.clo: Understand the basic concepts and techniques of data mining.

question.question: 6. What is the most common measure used to evaluate K-means clusters?

questions.clo: Evaluate and assess the effectiveness of different data mining techniques.

question.question: 7. Which clustering method quantizes the object space into a finite number of cells?

questions.clo: Understand the basic concepts and techniques of data mining.

question.question: 8. What is a key characteristic of density-based clustering methods?

answers.A: - A. Divides data objects into non-overlapping subsets
answers.B: - B. Organizes clusters as a hierarchical tree
answers.C: - C. Divides objects based on the notion of density
answers.D: - D. Quantizes the object space into cells

questions.clo: Understand the basic concepts and techniques of data mining.

question.question: 9. Which of the following is a consideration for cluster analysis?

questions.clo: Understand the basic concepts and techniques of data mining.

question.question: 10. What is the purpose of using medoids in the K-medoids algorithm?

answers.B: - B. To use centroids for clustering
answers.D: - D. To quantize the object space

questions.clo: Understand the basic concepts and techniques of data mining.
